# NSFileSecurity

**Class**

A stub class that encapsulates security information about a file.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSFileSecurity
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileSecurity] contains no methods of its own. Instead, it is transparently bridged to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFFileSecurity].

## Initializers

- **init(coder:)**

## Managed file access

- **FileHandle**: An object-oriented wrapper for a file descriptor.
- **NSFileVersion**: A snapshot of a file at a specific point in time.
- **FileWrapper**: A representation of a node (a file, directory, or symbolic link) in the file system.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
